name: Ipay Manual Payment Gateway
author: Md Zahedul Hoque

sections.description:
This is a cool plugin to integrate ipay payment gateway in any WooCommerce based website. It is lightweight and easy to use.

Please note:
– This is a WooCommerce based plugin, so WooCommerce plugin must be activated before active this plugin.
– You must have a ipay account to get payments.

Using the Plugin

  • Download the plugin, install and active.

  • Click on Settings or go to WooCommerce > Settings > Ipay,

  • Now you will see few default setup. You must fill up ipay account number and account type and also adjust other fields to get payment.

  • That’s it. You are ready to go!
sections.installation:
Installation process is very easy. Follow the steps bellow:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly by search Ipay.
  2. Then activate the plugin.
  3. Click on Setting or Go to WooCommerce > settings > checkout > ipay and setup your necessary settings.
sections.faq:
What is ipay?

Ipay is a mobile financial service in Bangladesh operating under the authority of Bangladesh Bank

Is it WooCommerce dependent plugins?

Yes, You must install and active WooCommerce plugins before active this plugin.

Ipay merchant account is necessary?

No, it could be personal or agent account. You need to manually varify the Payment reference number.

Is it secured?

100%, Maintained high level validation in both front-end and back-end.
